highConcept.name: Aspiring Artist
highConcept.description: Skeleton believes in creating his very own magnum opus, altough struggles with fulfilling these ambitions.

trouble.name: Cursed To Jester
trouble.description: Always wanted to be one for drama, everyone laughs at his attempts instead.

aspects.name: Potions Scary
aspects.description: Rimidiris once blew up a laboratory in chemistry class, and has since then an incredible fear of potions and bottles.

aspects.name: Fantasy Nerd
aspects.description: Having once met a great writer that mixed genres of old medieval times and the supernatural, Rimidiris have always been fond of such.
